slides.title: منتجات طازجة
slides.description: نحن نقدم مجموعة متنوعة من المنتجات الطازجة والعالية الجودة لضمان تلبية احتياجات عائلتك الغذائية.

slides.title: زيتون عالي الجودة
slides.description: نقدم أفضل أنواع الزيتون، سواءً كان زيتون أخضر أو أسود، طازج ومغذٍ ومناسب لجميع استخداماتك.

slides.title: خضروات طازجة
slides.description: تجد لدينا أفضل أنواع الخضروات الطازجة والمغذية، مباشرة من المزارع إلى طاولتك.

slides.title: فواكه طازجة
slides.description: استمتع بأشهى وألذ الفواكه الطازجة المتنوعة لصحة أفضل.

slides.title: منتجات عضوية
slides.description: نوفر لكم خيارات غذائية عضوية صحية تضمن تغذية متكاملة لعائلتك.

aboutSection.heading: Empowering Each Other to Succeed
aboutSection.paragraph: In every step we take towards the future, we place quality at the forefront of our priorities. Together, we work passionately to ensure we deliver the best food products to our customers, with every partnership we establish becoming a part of our ongoing story of delivering excellence.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions or need support, feel free to contact us. We are here to help you and meet all your needs.
contactUs.contactForm: The contact form is currently disabled. Get a working contact form using Ajax and PHP in just a few minutes. Simply copy and paste the files, add some code, and you’re done. Download Now.
contactUs.name: Your Name
contactUs.subject: Subject

footer.companyDescription: Shaza Alsham is a company specializing in providing the finest local food products, committed to offering high-quality products that meet our customers' needs.

types.description: We take care to select the best natural ingredients to ensure a delicious taste and high nutritional value.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: Shaza Alsham is a leading company in the food products sector, specializing in offering the finest local and natural food products. We are committed to providing high-quality products that meet consumer needs and achieve customer satisfaction.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be at the forefront of food companies in the region, continuously developing our products and adhering to the highest standards of quality and safety to provide the best value to our customers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To deliver healthy and natural food products with exceptional quality, while adhering to ethical and professional values in all aspects of our work.

values.title: Our Values
content: Quality: We strive to provide the best products with the highest standards of quality.
Integrity: We are committed to transparency and honesty in all our dealings.
Innovation: We constantly seek new ways to improve our products and services.
Sustainability: We are committed to practices that protect the environment and support the community.

history.title: Our History
history.content: Shaza Alsham was established in [Year of Establishment], and since then we have been striving for excellence in the food sector. Thanks to our dedication and commitment to quality, we have built a strong reputation and earned the trust of our customers.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: We offer a wide range of food products including oils, canned goods, spices, and more. We work on developing innovative products that meet consumer needs and keep up with the latest trends in the food industry.

qualityPolicy.title: Quality and Food Safety Policy | Shaza Alsham
qualityPolicy.header: Quality and Food Safety Policy of Shaza Alsham
commitments: Ensuring the highest standards of food safety and hygiene.
Continuous improvement through regular audits and inspections.
Compliance with local and international food safety regulations.
Using the finest ingredients in all our products.
qualityPolicy.foodSafetyContent: We are committed to globally recognized food safety practices to ensure that every product we provide is safe and healthy for consumption. Our team maintains a culture of food safety by carefully monitoring every stage of production.
qualityPolicy.foodSafetyContentAdditional: Through regular training and updating our processes, we ensure that our products remain compliant with evolving standards in the food industry.

careers.title: Careers | Shatha Al Sham
careers.intro: Join our team and contribute to delivering high-quality food products.

jobs.title: Sales Manager
jobs.description: We are looking for a Sales Manager with experience in sales and customer relations.
requirements: At least 3 years of experience in sales.

jobs.title: Financial Accountant
jobs.description: We need a Financial Accountant experienced in preparing financial reports and data analysis.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in accounting or finance.
Proficiency in financial software such as Excel and SAP.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description: We are looking for a Marketing Manager experienced in developing marketing strategies and driving sales.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in marketing or a related field.
At least 7 years of experience in marketing.
Creativity and ability to manage marketing teams.

jobs.title: Factory Worker
jobs.description: We are looking for a factory worker to work in production lines, capable of handling machinery and equipment.
requirements: Ability to work in a manufacturing environment.
